verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The prophets foretold
A king would come
Born to a virgin
Of lowly estate

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You who are poor
And discouraged
Take courage for
Your king is here
He will not falter
Or be discouraged
Till his kingdom come

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Giver of joy giver of hope giver of peace giver of life
Giver of every good thing has come into the world
Giver of joy giver of hope giver of peace giver of life
Giver of every good thing has come into the world

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Giver of joy giver of hope giver of peace giver of life (x5)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sing to the Lord a new song
Praise Him to the ends of the earth
You who go down to the sea
You islands praise the Lord
